award.title: National Top 7 in Master Plan 2K18
award.description:
• Masterplan is the annual business plan competition hosted by IIM Ahmedabad. Masterplan seeks to identify budding entrepreneurs to contribute to India’s buzzing economy.
• It is organized by Entre Cell, in collaboration with The Centre for Innovation Incubation and Entrepreneurship (CIIE) and Red Brick Summit.
• Achieved Top 7 Rank after clearing multiple elimination rounds in National Business Plan Competition by IIM Ahmedabad.

award.title: Top 5 in Facebook Developer Hackathon
award.description:
Developed a mobile application and named it as Medisyst.
• Machine Learning based solution for the prediction of diseases on the basis of Symptoms, Gender and Age.
• It Provides all possible diseases with their percentage of accuracy.
• Secured Top 5 position among all other competitors.

award.title: Rank 1 in Ideathon hosted by OWASP
award.description:
Developed a mobile application and named it as Shashakti - Empowering Nation.
• A Mechanism to deliver government schemes to all the citizen.
• Uses machine learning algorithm to predict the interest of the person and deliver respective schemes on his mobile phone.

award.title: Rank 1 in Hello Web Hackathon
award.description:
Developed a mobile application and named it as Chhotu.
• Chhotu is article summarizer mobile application that can be used to generate the summary of a document provided by the user. 
• It doesn’t use any Machine Learning or Natural Language Processing Techniques, but Regex based string processing to achieve its goal.
• This article summarizer was developed in under 24hrs time bracket during a hackathon competition hosted by Mozilla.
• This mobile application fetched our team Rank 1 in this hackathon.
